alert.note: Alert for Greene; Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 9:08PM CDT until June 14 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Greene County in eastern Arkansas... Northwestern Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Southern Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 908 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marmaduke, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Gosnell, Manila, Leachville, Senath, Cardwell, Hornersville, Arbyrd, Dell, Little River, Jolliff Store, Calumet, Dearman, Lennie, Carmi, Buckeye, Mounds, Arkmo, Bertig and Roseland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
